name: Association of Independent Tour Operators
goal: AITO is a group of unique and specialist travel companies which collectively provide an unrivalled range of holidays to every corner of the world. Our members are passionate about what they do and pride themselves on their attention to every detail of their customersâ€™ holidays. AITO operators know their destinations and the experiences they offer inside out. Booking with an AITO operator assures the finest personal service and a quality holiday experience.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade
